title: Simple Strokes to RGB Kernel
description: Convert Strokes to RGB ImagesThis kernel explains how to pre-process the image to create rbg images, for using in the traditional pretrained networks.  We use the opencv package in python to achieve this. reference: Greyscale MobileNet [LB=0.892]
